REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f5621 reute r f BC-SCOR-U.S.-CORP-<SURE> 03-17 0080

TEXT.TITLE: SCOR U.S. CORP <SURE> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr 29 cts vs 22 cts Oper net 3.9 mln vs 1.8 mln Year Oper shr 63 cts vs four cts Oper net 10.1 mln vs 855,000 NOTE: Excludes gain one ct per share vs loss two cts in the quarter, and gain 41 cts per share vs gain six cts in the year from investments. Also excludes extraordinary gain of one ct per share in fourth quarter 1985, and gain of one ct per share vs one ct in the full year period. Reuter
